query: Load the cron-scheduler plugin and verify it registers its tool and starts its background service
expected_behavior: The plugin loader discovers extensions/cron-scheduler/openclaw.plugin.json and validates the manifest
The plugin lifecycle fires in order: load → init → start with no errors
After start(), the schedule_task tool appears in the tool registry and is callable by the agent
The cron scheduler background service is running and its status is reported in gateway.status
Disabling the plugin in config prevents it from loading on next gateway start
